MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich, affecting properties in Mill Lane and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required to locate and repair the fault and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.55PM on 14th February 2021.
